    G

    GET(String, int, String) - Method in class DBController
    Retrive a single entry from a CSV database row.
    GET_COL(String, String) - Method in class DBController
    Retrives a specific column from a csv file in the database
    GET_CSV(String) - Method in class DBController
    Returns entire csv table in the form of an Arraylist of Hashmaps.
    GET_ROW(String, int, String) - Method in class DBController
    Returns a whole row from a specified table in hashmap form

    Database method to get the number of rows in a given csv file

    Method used to the the yearly income tax (PAYE) given the gross salary
    getInsure(float) - Method in class TaxCalc
    Method used to get the yearly insurance cost given the gross salary
    getPRSI(float) - Method in class TaxCalc
    Method used to calculate the yearly PRSI given the gross salary

    Method to retrieve salary data for part time positions
    getSalaryData(String, String, int) - Method in class SalaryScale

    getUnion(float) - Method in class TaxCalc
    Method used to get the yearly union fee given the gross salary
    getUSC(float) - Method in class TaxCalc
    Method used to calculate the yearly USC given the gross salary

    H

    hashPassword(String) - Static method in class PasswordUtil
    Method used to hash a plain text string (password in this case), to a SHA-256 hash in order to store in the csv database

    P

    PartScale - Class in Unnamed Package
    The PartScale class calculates the salary for part-time positions based on the employee's job title and years of service.
    PartScale() - Constructor for class PartScale
    Default constructor to initialise a PartScale object
    PasswordUtil - Class in Unnamed Package
    The PasswordUtil class provides functionality to hash plain text passwords using SHA-256 with a salt, for secure storage in the database.
    PasswordUtil() - Constructor for class PasswordUtil
    Default constructor to initliase the PasswordUtil class
    PayrollSystem - Class in Unnamed Package
    PayrollSystem used to run the PayrollSystemMenu
    PayrollSystem() - Constructor for class PayrollSystem
    Default constructor for PayrollSystem object.
    PayrollSystemMenu - Class in Unnamed Package
    The PayrollSystemMenu class provides a command-line interface for managing payroll operations, including creating payslips, updating salaries, and handling employee information.
    PayrollSystemMenu() - Constructor for class PayrollSystemMenu
    Default constructor to initialise PayrollSystemMenu The constructor initialises the Scanner, DBController, TaxCalc and SalaryUpdate classes

    R

    Run Function that activates software

    S

    salary - Variable in class SalaryScale

    SalaryScale - Class in Unnamed Package
    Object used to store emplyee's salary, job title and years of service
    SalaryScale() - Constructor for class SalaryScale
    Default constructor for SalaryScale object
    SalaryUpdate - Class in Unnamed Package
    The SalaryUpdate class updates employees' salaries based on their role type, department, job title, and years of service when the scheduled salary update date arrives.
    SalaryUpdate() - Constructor for class SalaryUpdate
    Default constructor to initialise a SalaryUpdate object

    T

    TaxCalc - Class in Unnamed Package
    The TaxCalc class calculates yearly tax deductions such as PRSI and USC based on an employee's gross salary.
    TaxCalc() - Constructor for class TaxCalc
    Default constructor to initialise a TaxCalc object

    updateSalaries() - Method in class SalaryUpdate
